location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 41 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Sheraz [Shiraz] to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government (No 979 of 1822), which informed the Resident that owing to improved relations between Britain and Persia, the order to send reinforcements to Kishm [Qeshm] has been countermanded.
